local itemsList = json.decode(hub.getItemsList())
total = 0
QuantityList = {}
local NameList = {}
StorageAcquiredContent = ""

for entry,itemData in pairs(itemsList) do
    
    if itemData.quantity > 1000 then
        quantity = reformatInt(math.floor(itemData.quantity/1000)) .. "kl"
    else
        quantity = reformatInt(math.floor(itemData.quantity))
    end

    if isOre(itemData.name) then
        total = total + price(itemData.name)*math.floor(itemData.quantity)        
    end

    QuantityList[#QuantityList +1] = quantity
    
    if #itemData.name > 19 then
        NameList[#NameList+1] = string.sub(itemData.name,1,19).."."
    else
        NameList[#NameList+1] = itemData.name
    end
    
    --system.print(string.sub(itemData.name,1,5))
    --system.print(itemData.name .. " length: " .. #itemData.name)

end

if ShowValue == true then
    StorageAcquiredContent = [[
    AddText(AlignH_Center,fontColor,BiggestFont, "Value: ]]..reformatInt(total)..[[Ä§", rx*0.73,ry*0.8)
    ]]
end

for i = 1, #NameList do 
    StorageAcquiredContent = StorageAcquiredContent .. [[
    AddText(AlignH_Left,fontColor,BiggerFont, "]]..NameList[i]..[[", rx*0.53,]].. 35+i*50 ..[[)
    AddText(AlignH_Right,fontColor,BiggerFont, "]]..QuantityList[i]..[[", rx*0.93,]].. 35+i*50 ..[[)
    ]]
end

for index, screen in pairs(screens) do

end

InitialScreenContent = [[

local D=createLayer()
local H=createLayer()
local rx,ry=getResolution() 
local BiggestFont = loadFont("Play-Bold", 50)
local BiggerFont = loadFont("Play-Bold", 34) 
local NormalFont = loadFont("RobotoCondensed", 20) 
local SmallerFont = loadFont("Play-Bold", 18) 
local SmallestFont = loadFont("RobotoCondensed", 15)
color1 = {r=1,g=0.76,b=0.06}
color2 = {r=34/255,g=177/255,b=76/255}
setDefaultFillColor(D,Shape_Text,0.710,0.878,0.941,1)
setDefaultStrokeWidth(D,Shape_Line,8)
setDefaultStrokeColor(D,Shape_Line,color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
function DrawFrame(X,Y,Width,Height)
    --  ___                 ___
    -- /   \_______________/   \
    -- |                       |
    -- |                       |
    -- |                       |
    -- |    _______________    |
    -- \___/               \___/  this is not a bone!
    --
    X = X - Width/2 -- centering
    xo = 20 -- offset x for curve
    yo = 20 -- offset y for curve
    addLine(D, X, Y, X+Width,Y)-- top line
    addLine(D, X, Y+Height, X+Width,Y+Height)-- bottom line
    addLine(D,X,Y , X-xo, Y-yo)-- top left curve
    addLine(D,X-xo, Y-yo , X-Width/4-xo, Y-yo)-- top left line
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo, Y-yo , X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y)-- top left corner curve
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y, X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y+Height)-- left line
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y, X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y+Height)-- right line
    addLine(D,X+Width,Y, X+Width+xo, Y-yo)-- top right curve
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo, Y-yo , X+Width+xo+Width/4, Y-yo)-- top right line
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4, Y-yo , X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y)-- top right corner curve
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo, Y+Height , X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom right curve
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+Width/4+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo , X+Width+xo+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom right line
    addLine(D,X+Width+xo+xo-xo, Y+Height+yo , X+Width+xo+xo-xo-xo, Y+Height+yo-yo)-- top right corner curve
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo, Y+Height , X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom left curve
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo, Y+Height+yo , X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo+Width/4, Y+Height+yo)-- bottom left line
    addLine(D,X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo+Width/4, Y+Height+yo , X-Width/4-xo-xo+xo+Width/4+xo, Y+Height+yo-yo)-- bottom left corner curve
end

function AddText(align,color,font,text,x,y)
    setNextTextAlign(H, align, AlignV_Middle)
   -- setNextFillColor(H, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)  
    addText(H, font, text, x,y) 
end

function DrawProgressBar(X,Y,Width,Height,Max,Current,text1,text2,Font)    
    setNextStrokeWidth(D, 1) 
    setNextStrokeColor(D,color2.r, color2.g, color2.b, 1)
    setNextFillColor(D, 0, 0, 0, 1)
    addBoxRounded(D,X-Width/2,Y,Width,Height,5)
    AddText(AlignH_Right,color1,Font, text1, X-Width/2-20,Y+Height/2)
    AddText(AlignH_Left,color1, Font,text2, X+Width/2+20,Y+Height/2)
    --setNextFillColor(D, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)
    addBoxRounded(D,X-Width/2+5,Y+5,Current*Width/Max-10,Height-10,5)
end


]]


function reformatInt(i)
  return tostring(i):reverse():gsub("%d%d%d", "%1 "):reverse():gsub("^,", "")
end

function isOre(name)
     if name == "Bauxite" or
        name == "Coal" or
        name == "Quartz" or
        name == "Hematite" or
        name == "Natron" or
        name == "Chromite" or
        name == "Limestone" or
        name == "Malachite" or
        name == "Garnierite" or
        name == "Acanthite" or
        name == "Petalite" or
        name == "Pyrite" or
        name == "Cryolite" or
        name == "Cobaltite" or
        name == "Kolbeckite" or
        name == "Gold nuggets" or
        name == "Columbite" or
        name == "Vanadinite" or
        name == "Illmenite" or
        name == "Rhodonite" or
        name == "Thoramine" then
        return true
     else return false
     end
end

function price(ore)
     if ore == "Bauxite" then return Bauxite elseif
        ore == "Coal" then return Coal elseif
        ore == "Quartz" then return Quartz elseif
        ore == "Hematite" then return Hematite elseif
        ore == "Natron" then return Natron elseif
        ore == "Chromite" then return Chromite elseif
        ore == "Limestone" then return Limestone elseif
        ore == "Malachite" then return Malachite elseif
        ore == "Garnierite" then return Garnierite elseif
        ore == "Acanthite" then return Acanthite elseif
        ore == "Petalite" then return Petalite elseif
        ore == "Pyrite" then return Pyrite elseif
        ore == "Cryolite" then return Cryolite elseif
        ore == "Cobaltite" then return Cobaltite elseif
        ore == "Kolbeckite" then return Kolbeckite elseif
        ore == "Gold nuggets" then return Gold_Nuggets elseif
        ore == "Columbite" then return Columbite elseif
        ore == "Vanadinite" then return Vanadinite elseif
        ore == "Illmenite" then return Illmenite elseif
        ore == "Rhodonite" then return Rhodonite elseif
        ore == "Thoramine" then return Thoramine 
     end
end
